page.title: 07Hellesdon's services/events
page.content: The community Police officers are P.C. Bowe and P.C.Wyatt.They try to make as many contacts as they can by visiting schools clubs and as many representative groups as possible concerning all ages. The Horticultural association will soon be reaching it's thirtieth year,with a membership of over 400.The Association has made donations to the National Heart Foundations from money raised on it's charity evenings.An annual charity sale and fete called the Mayfair has many stalls in the Receation Ground every May.Many good bargains are at low prices,all in a good cause can be bought.Much of the profits go to local charities and the Community Centre.The Red Cross has a thriving group in Hellesdon.The Hellesdon centre organiser is Mrs.Audrey Mason.B.E.M.
